citeinfo.title: Spatial distribution of depth-averaged velocity measured in the Des Plaines River, Illinois (October 21, 2015)
citeinfo.geoform: CSV file of time- and depth-averaged velocity data (5-second temporal average)

descript.abstract:
These data were collected using a 1200 kHz TRDI Rio Grande acoustic Doppler current profiler (ADCP) in mode 12 with 25 centimeter bins from a moving boat. The data were georeferenced with a Trimble AG132 differential Global Positioning System (GPS) receiver with submeter accuracy. The data have been depth-averaged over the entire measured portion of the water column, temporally averaged over 5-second intervals to reduce noise, and exported as a .csv file using the Velocity Mapping Toolbox (Parsons and others, 2013). These data were collected in support of the US Army Corps of Engineers Great Lakes and Mississippi River Interbasin Study (GLMRIS), and were concurrent with a dye-tracing study. NOTE: Any data assigned a value of "-9999" are invalid or missing data and should not be used for analysis.
Parsons, D. R., Jackson, P. R., Czuba, J. A., Engel, F. L., Rhoads, B. L., Oberg, K. A., Best, J. L., Mueller, D. S., Johnson, K. K. and Riley, J. D. (2013), Velocity Mapping Toolbox (VMT): a processing and visualization suite for moving-vessel ADCP measurements. Earth Surf. Process. Landforms, 38: 1244–1260. doi: 10.1002/esp.3367
descript.purpose: These data were collected in support of the US Army Corps of Engineers Great Lakes and Mississippi River Interbasin Study (GLMRIS), and were concurrent with a dye-tracing study.

cntperp.cntorg: U.S. Geological Survey Illinois Water Science Center

idinfo.datacred: Great Lakes and Mississippi River Interbasin Study

attracc.attraccr: No formal attribute accuracy tests were conducted

dataqual.logic: No formal logical accuracy tests were conducted
dataqual.complete: Data set is considered complete for the information presented, as described in the abstract. Users are advised to read the rest of the metadata record carefully for additional details.

horizpa.horizpar: No formal positional accuracy tests were conducted

vertacc.vertaccr: No formal positional accuracy tests were conducted

procstep.procdesc: Data processed per the Velocity Mapping Toolbox (VMT) v. 4.08 ASCII2GIS utility with full-depth averaging and 5-second temporal averaging. For details on VMT and its utilities, see: https://hydroacoustics.usgs.gov/movingboat/VMT/VMT.shtml NOTE: Any data assigned a value of "-9999" are invalid or missing data and should not be used for analysis.

overview.eaover: NOTE: Any data assigned a value of "-9999" are invalid or missing data and should not be used for analysis. NAME DESCRIPTION EnsNo Ensemble Number Year Year of sample Month Month of sample Day Day of sample Hour Hour of sample Min Minute of sample Sec Second of sample Lat_WGS84 Latitude in WGS84 Lon_WGS84 Longitude in WGS84 Heading_deg Heading reading at time of sample in degrees from true north Pitch_deg Pitch reading at time of sample in degrees Roll_deg Roll reading at time of sample in degrees Temp_C Temperature at time of sample in deg. C Depth_m Mean bed depth at time of sample in meters B1Depth_m Beam 1 bed depth at time of sample in meters B2Depth_m Beam 2 bed depth at time of sample in meters B3Depth_m Beam 3 bed depth at time of sample in meters B4Depth_m Beam 4 bed depth at time of sample in meters Backscatter_db Acoustic backscatter in dB DAVeast_cmps Depth- or Layer-averaged velocity (east component) in cm/s DAVnorth_cmps Depth- or Layer-averaged velocity (north component) in cm/s DAVmag_cmps Depth- or Layer-averaged velocity magnitude in cm/s DAVdir_deg Depth- or Layer-averaged velocity direction in degrees from true north DAVvert_cmps Depth- or Layer-averaged velocity (vertical) in cm/s (+ is up)
overview.eadetcit: https://hydroacoustics.usgs.gov/movingboat/VMT/VMT.shtml (see The Velocity Mapping Toolbox Users Guide, specifically the output file format for the ASCII2GIS utility).

cntaddr.address: Denver Federal Center, Building 810, Mail Stop 302

distinfo.distliab: Unless otherwise stated, all data, metadata and related materials are considered to satisfy the quality standards relative to the purpose for which the data were collected. Although these data and associated metadata have been reviewed for accuracy and completeness and approved for release by the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), no warranty expressed or implied is made regarding the display or utility of the data on any other system or for general or scientific purposes, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty.

digtinfo.formcont: This WinZip file contains a CSV file (.csv) with depth-averaged velocity data (with a 5-second temporal average applied) for the Des Plaines River on October 21, 2015 (20151021_DAV_5secAVG.csv). This WinZip file also contains metadata.

cntperp.cntorg: U.S. Geological Survey, Illinois Water Science Center

metainfo.metstdn: Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
